channel.title: [REQ] Animated Godwars Npc's [317] [REQ]
channel.description:
Hello, I am in the need of the animated Godwars npc's, on a 317 server.
I need animated: Zamorak: K'ril Tsutsaroth, Balfrug, Tstanon, Zakl'n, Gorak, Hellhound, Werewolf, Bloodveld, Vampire, Pyrefiend, Icefiend, and Imp. Saradomin: Commander Zilyana, Bree, Starlight, Growler, Saradomin knight, and Saradomin priest. Armadyl: Kree'arra, Kilisa, Geerin, Skree, and Aviansie. Bandos: Graardor, Grimspike, Steelwill, Strongstack, Ork, Cyclops, Jogre, Ogre, Hobgoblin, and Goblin.
It would be greatly appreciated, if anyone hate the animated models, to post a link for download. Also, if you have ints, please post those as well, unless they are included in the download.
Thanks, Grim.

They need to be animated server side, and through the ints, and through the converter, it’s pretty much impossible to do all 3 of these.

item.title: [REQ] Animated Godwars Npc's [317] [REQ]
item.dc:creator: @GrimReapersScythe GrimReapersScythe

@GrimReapersScythe wrote:

I’ve read the tutorial on how to animate them, but it makes no sense to me, I don’t understand anything relating to models, except how to add them.

Read full topic

item.title: [REQ] Animated Godwars Npc's [317] [REQ]
item.dc:creator: @Tatemo Tatemo
item.description:
@Tatemo wrote:

They need to be manually animated which is very difficult to do. Cj and Dragmagic are probably the best at animating I know but they aren’t going to do it for you. Go to dragon-scape.co.cc to learn to animate.

Read full topic

item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

GrimReapersScythe:

I have the bandos boss in my server, but he isn’t animated, I have no clue how to animate models, thats why I am requesting the animated models, because I can get the regular models, but I need them animated.

The problem is they cannot get the correct animations. These were made in a higher series of servers that used a diferent loading method.

Read full topic
